Description.Name: Misjump - Extensive Damage
Description.Details: Darius comes into your office and hands you a datapad, "Commander, we have the cost estimates to repair the circuit boards and other components damaged from that misjump." You take the datapad and scroll through the information, "It is going to cost anywhere from ¢10,000,000 to ¢12,000,000 to fix those components?!" Darius responds, "Yes sir. There was extensive damage to nearly all of the engine components and some of them are quite rare, especially considering where we are." You toss the datapad onto your desk, "And if we opt to NOT do the repairs?" Darius picks up the datapad, scrolls through some data, "Until we repair those systems, we will be travelling at the same speed we were when we found the Argo. We also lose access to the Pirate Points until we repair the console." Darius calmly awaits your decision.

Description.Name: Postpone Repairs
Description.Details: Wait 14 Days

Description.Name: Postpone
Description.Details: You think for a long moment before responding, "We really cannot spare the funds right now. Let's revist this in a fortnight and see if we can fit it in the budget. It will just take us a bit longer to get anywhere right now." Darius nods, "Very well, Commander. " The KF Console is damaged and offline until repairs can be made. The Argo has sustained extensive damage and travel times are increased until full repairs are made.

Description.Name: Postpone Repairs
Description.Details: Wait 30 Days

Description.Name: Postpone
Description.Details: You think for a long moment before responding, "We really cannot spare the funds right now. Let's revist this next month and see if we can fit it in the budget. It will just take us a bit longer to get anywhere right now." Darius nods, "Very well, Commander. " The KF Console is damaged and offline until repairs can be made. The Argo has sustained extensive damage and travel times are increased until full repairs are made.

Description.Name: Just Repair the Argo Drives
Description.Details: [Estimated cost of  up to ¢11,000,000]

Description.Name: Repair Partial Extensive Damage
Description.Details: You think for a long moment before responding, "Get the work on the Argo's Drives done, Darius. We need to at least be back to full operational levels. We can look getting the Console running later." Darius smiles, "Understood, Commander." Later that day, you run into Dairus in one of the corridors, "Commander, The work has commenced and should be done soon. The final bill came in at ¢10165530

Description.Name: Repair Console and Argo Drives
Description.Details: [Estimated cost of  up to ¢12,000,000]

Description.Name: Extensive Damage
Description.Details:
You think for a long moment before responding, "Get the work done, Darius.  We have the funds, and what are the odds of another misjump like that happening again anyways?"

Darius smiles, "Hopefully very slim, Commander."

Later that day, you run into Dairus in one of the corridors, "Commander, The work has commenced and should be done soon.  The final bill came in at ¢11165530
